pages.title: Personal Time Rewinder
pages.text: The <item>Personal Time Rewinder/$ is a handheld gadget which allows 'saving' a moment in time, and restoring yourself to it. Restoring a moment will move you back to the location, health, hunger, orientation, and momentum you saved (by default).$(br2)Save a moment by shift-right-clicking,

and restore to a moment by right clicking. Only one moment can be saved at a time, and restoring a moment will save a new moment when you activate it.$(br2)Restoring a moment will cause temporal-whiplash in the form of nausea and possibly poison. The effect is more serious the longer ago the moment was saved.$(br2)

By default, saved moments will expire if not used within 5 minutes. The <item>Personal Time Rewinder/$ must be wound up in a <item>$(l:essentials:rotary/winding_table)Spring Winding Stand/$ in order to be used. It uses 0.4 $(l:essentials:rotary/winding_table)<thing>spring speed/$ each use, and can be wound to a maximum of 10.$(br2)
